name: PUPUMP
description:
This game was created for the 125th Mini game Jam with the theme "Signal" and with the limitation  "Everything is tied to the rhythm" (I've updated the game to fix a memory leak issue, but I believe the original can be played by pressing download?)

You play as a courageous red blood cell with the mission to get to the brain!! Yet I guess the human you're in is pretty sick or something cause there's a whole bunch of evil monster bacteria things out to get you!! :OOO
